channel.title: Upload/Download Script - Easy to use
channel.description:
This is a very easy to use upload/download php script that I found while googling stuff. You do [b][u]NOT[/u][/b] need a mySQL database [u][b]OR[/b][/u] any PHP experience. You can easily make this script better then anything Rapidshare uses (no ads, no wait times, no wait time between download").
You can download it Link accidentaly deleted. Getting it back now ;)
I will post a link to the version I uploaded as soon as i get the link approved.
Please read the readme.txt file for details on how to get it set up correctly (not that hard).
This is %100 working and I havn't had any problems with it. Please tell me if stuff like this isn't allowed (even though it is legal). Please post if you download/use
Thank you, Mdog
